channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool powered by OpenTelemetry. Get APM, logs, traces, metrics, exceptions, & alerts in a single tool.

item.title: 8 Essential Steps to Develop a Winning Cloud Strategy
item.description: Discover the 8 crucial steps to create an effective cloud strategy. Learn how to align cloud adoption with business goals and optimize your IT infrastructure.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)
